name: Super Sean 007
description:
Super Sean 007 is a platform game with a great world. The world consists of various beautiful sceneries of nature: forests, caves, mountains, and abandoned ruins telling the stories of when there used to be a civilization there.
  • Players will defeat various types of enemies.
  • Players will go through the level until all the main quest requirements in that level are finished.
  • If a player finished all the levels, the whole levels will be reset as the score would be displayed in personal best highscore.
  • Additions: Players are able to go back to the previous level if they are willing to finish the side quests through the teleport points.
